HasTCPs.Description: This function verifies whether the file with extension is .tcp is activated in Tally.ini file or not. This function does not accept any parameter and returns a logical value. If .TCP file is available it will return a logical value Yes otherwise returns a logical value No.
HasTCPs.Name: HasTCPs

MODMaterialReqt.Description: This function tell whether material requirement module is enabled or not. In the current system this is always disabled.
MODMaterialReqt.Name: MODMaterialReqt

MODOrderProcessing.Description: This function returns TRUE/FALSE depedning on whether the OrderProcessing module is enabled or not. In the current system this is always TRUE.
MODOrderProcessing.Name: MODOrderProcessing
